com.microsoft.windowsazure.management.sql

Class SqlManagementClientImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.microsoft.windowsazure.core.ServiceClient<SqlManagementClient>
      • com.microsoft.windowsazure.management.sql.SqlManagementClientImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FilterableService<SqlManagementClient>, SqlManagementClient, Closeable, AutoCloseable

    public class SqlManagementClientImpl
extends ServiceClient<SqlManagementClient>
implements SqlManagementClient
    This is the main client class for interacting with the Azure SQL Database REST APIs.

      • getDatabaseOperationsOperations

        public DatabaseOperationOperations getDatabaseOperationsOperations()
        The Azure SQL Database Management API includes operations for getting database operations. Specifically, this API allows you to get a specific operation, or to list all the operations that happened on a specific database or on all databases in the Azure SQL Database Server.
        Specified by:
        getDatabaseOperationsOperations in interface SqlManagementClient
        Returns:
        The DatabaseOperationsOperations value.

      • getDatabasesOperations

        public DatabaseOperations getDatabasesOperations()
        Represents all the operations for operating on Azure SQL Databases. Contains operations to: Create, Retrieve, Update, and Delete databases, and also includes the ability to get the event logs for a database.
        Specified by:
        getDatabasesOperations in interface SqlManagementClient
        Returns:
        The DatabasesOperations value.

      • getFirewallRulesOperations

        public FirewallRuleOperations getFirewallRulesOperations()
        The Azure SQL Database Management API includes operations for managing the server-level Firewall Rules for Azure SQL Database Servers. You cannot manage the database-level firewall rules using the Azure SQL Database Management API; they can only be managed by running the Transact-SQL statements against the master or individual user databases.
        Specified by:
        getFirewallRulesOperations in interface SqlManagementClient
        Returns:
        The FirewallRulesOperations value.

      • getQuotasOperations

        public QuotaOperations getQuotasOperations()
        The Azure SQL Database Management API includes operations for getting Azure SQL Database Server quotas. Specifically, using the APIs you can get a specific quota or list all of the quotas for the Azure SQL Database Server.
        Specified by:
        getQuotasOperations in interface SqlManagementClient
        Returns:
        The QuotasOperations value.
